CustomField.description: If this check box is selected then delinquency grace days are not considered while calculating aging. E.g., If delinquency grace days are 7 and dues are unpaid for 9 days then aging is 2 days if you select this checkbox.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this check box is selected then delinquency grace days are not considered while calculating aging. E.g., If delinquency grace days are 7 and dues are unpaid for 9 days then aging is 2 days if you select this checkbox.
CustomField.label: Exclude Delinquency Grace Days in Aging
